sentences.en: A place to talk about things related to freelancer also you can show your pictures here.
sentences.cn: 提供游侠们闲聊,展示游戏模组截图画面,讨论各种话题的专区.

sentences.en: Are you the average business owner or freelancer like I am?
sentences.cn: 你是像我一样的中型企业主或者自由作家吗？

sentences.en: Freelancer is - employed person working in a profession or trade in which full - time employment is also common.
sentences.cn: 根据《韦氏大词典》,自由职业者是:独立工作,不隶属于任何组织的人;不向任何雇主做长期承诺而从事某种职业的人.

sentences.en: Freelancer is toilsome and enjoyable; it is a challengeable occupation full of more feelings of achievement!
sentences.cn: 自由翻译是辛苦的、也是快乐的; 是具有挑战性的,更是具有成就感的职业!

sentences.en: He has great interest in working as a freelancer.
sentences.cn: 他对做个自由职业人很感兴趣。

sentences.en: If you love systematic structure, don't become a freelancer.
sentences.cn: 如果你喜欢系统化结构, 不要做自由职业者.

sentences.en: It's not always easy to make it as a freelancer.
sentences.cn: 做个自由职业人,要能时常感觉满足,可不容易.

sentences.en: Needless to say, people who try and resell articles for less on Freelancer need not apply.
sentences.cn: 不用说, 人们谁试图转售较少需要对自由职业者不适用条款.

sentences.en: Payment will be made via Freelancer escrow only.
sentences.cn: 付款将只通过自由职业者代管.

sentences.en: The freelancer must survive on his own.
There are a lot of benefits of moving ahead from simply being a freelancer. But there are quite a few risks involved too.
sentences.cn: 比起只是简单地成为一名自由职业者，成立自己的公司有非常多的好处，当然也涉及一些风险。

sentences.en: When one client takes all your time that is a boss and you have a job, not a client and freelancer relationship.
sentences.cn: 当客户占光你的时间的时候，你们是老板和员工的关系，而非客户和自由职业者。

trans.tran_en: A freelancer is someone who does freelance work
